name: Satan Summoning Simulator
description:
Satan Summoning Simulator is a short game for the Global Game Jam Berlin 2016, where you have to combine items in order to summon the Lord of Darkness himself.

The team
Christian Janssen -development
Ariza Matzanke - game design
AXL.OTL - music and sfx
Kyrill Krysov - art (items and characters)
alpha_rats - art (items and background)
Ruth Bosch - art (logo and UI)

Made with Löve2D.
